pullRequest.body:
In preparation of future PRs dealing with estimates of the complex logarithm and its Taylor series, this introduces `Complex.slitPlane` for the set of complex numbers not on the closed negative real axis (in `Analysis.SpecialFunctions.Complex.Arg`), adds a bunch of API lemmas, and replaces hypotheses of the form `0 < x.re  ∨ x.im ≠ 0` by `x ∈ slitPlane` in several other files.

(We do not introduce a new file for that to avoid circular imports with `Analysis.SpecialFunctions.Complex.Arg`.)

---

nodes.body: I generalized the "star shaped" lemma and moved it to a new file. I also dropped in a lemma I wrote a few days ago but forgot to PR. Also, I added some lemmas and golfed proofs using `ComplexOrder`.
OK, nice. There is still a broken proof, though.

LGTM but I contributed too much to merge it myself. Thanks!

  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7306749288/job/19911757257)

Could you change the definition of `polarCoord` to make sure that this becomes definitional? Better use `slitPlane` everywhere it's natural!

The problem here is that `Complex.polarCoord` is defined via `polarCoord`, whose source is a subset of `ℝ × ℝ` and not `ℂ`. So I think to get this definitional equality, one would have to define `Complex.polarCoord` directly. I'll try this out.

After playing around for a while, I don't think there is a good way of making this work. Note that the original version also was not `rfl`: expanding the `simp` gives
```lean
  simp only [Complex.polarCoord, PartialHomeomorph.trans_toPartialEquiv, PartialEquiv.trans_source,
    Homeomorph.toPartialHomeomorph_source, PartialHomeomorph.toFun_eq_coe,
    Homeomorph.toPartialHomeomorph_apply, ContinuousLinearEquiv.coe_toHomeomorph, polarCoord_source,
    ne_eq, Set.preimage_union, Set.preimage_setOf_eq, equivRealProdClm_apply, Set.univ_inter]
```
Really defining `Complex.polarCoord` from scratch could work, but I don't think getting the defeq for the source is worth the code duplication.
Fixed by using `Homeomorph.transPartialHomeomorph` instead of converting a `Homeomorph` to a `PartialHomeomorph` first.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Analysis/SpecialFunctions/Complex/Arg): add definition for slit plane and API, and use it
